parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets wanted transparency for control animation. Requires [[ctrlCommit]] to commit changes. To hide or show a control instantly, use [[ctrlShow]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> controlName '''ctrlSetFade''' fade

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  controlName: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> fade: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetFade]] 1;
_control [[ctrlCommit]] 5;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlFade]], [[cutFadeOut]], [[ctrlCommit]]
</value></part></template>



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
